snippet: Thousands of people posted photos and updates on social media sites about their visits to Chick-fil-A restaurants on Wednesday in support of the company's president, who has drawn criticism for statements that he made last month against same-sex...
abstract: Thousands of people posted photos and updates on social media sites about their visits to Chick-fil-A restaurants on Wednesday in support of the company's president, who has drawn criticism for statements that he made last month against same-sex marriage.

headline.main: Chick-fil-A Draws Huge Crowds for Appreciation Day

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
